data.value: VBD {0} - Operation could not be performed because the drive is empty

data.name: VBD_NOT_EMPTY
data.value: VBD {0} - Operation could not be performed because the drive is not empty

data.name: VBD_NOT_REMOVABLE_MEDIA
data.value: VBD {0} - Media could not be ejected because it is not removable

data.name: VCPUS_MAX_ALLOWED
data.value: You have reached the maximum number of virtual CPUs allowed for this virtual machine.

data.name: VCPUS_MAX_ALLOWED_TITLE
data.value: Maximum number of virtual CPUs allowed

data.name: VDI_INCOMPATIBLE_TYPE
data.value: This operation cannot be performed because the specified virtual disk is of an incompatible type (e.g., an HA statefile cannot be attached to a VM)

data.name: VDI_IN_USE
data.value: This operation cannot be performed because a VDI is in use by some other operation.

data.name: VDI_IS_NOT_ISO
data.value: This operation can only be performed on CD VDIs (iso files or CDROM drives). VDI {0} is of type {1}.

data.name: VDI_LOCATION_MISSING
data.value: This operation cannot be performed because the specified virtual disk could not be found in the specified SR

data.name: VDI_MISSING
data.value: This operation cannot be performed because the specified virtual disk could not be found

data.name: VDI_NOT_AVAILABLE
data.value: This operation cannot be performed because VDI {0} could not be properly attached to the VM.

data.name: VDI_READONLY
data.value: The operation required write access but VDI {0} is read-only

data.name: VGPU_TYPE_NOT_COMPATIBLE_WITH_RUNNING_TYPE
data.value: The VM cannot start because all GPUs are fully used or are running other types of virtual GPU

data.name: VGPU_TYPE_NOT_ENABLED
data.value: Virtual GPU type is not one of the GPU's enabled types.

data.name: VGPU_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED
data.value: Virtual GPU type is not one of the GPU's supported types.

data.name: VIFS_MAX_ALLOWED
data.value: You have reached the maximum number of virtual network interfaces allowed for this virtual machine.

data.name: VIFS_MAX_ALLOWED_TITLE
data.value: Maximum number of virtual network interfaces allowed

data.name: VIF_NOT_IN_MAP
data.value: This VIF was not mapped to a destination network

data.name: VLAN_TAG_INVALID
data.value: You tried to create a VLAN, but the tag you gave ({0}) was invalid -- it must be between 0 and 4094.

data.name: VMPP_HAS_VM
data.value: There is at least on VM assigned to this protection policy.

data.name: VM_BAD_POWER_STATE
data.value: You attempted an operation on a VM that needed it to be in state '{1}' but was in state '{2}'.

data.name: VM_CHECKPOINT_RESUME_FAILED
data.value: An error occurred while restoring the memory image of the specified virtual machine

data.name: VM_CHECKPOINT_SUSPEND_FAILED
data.value: An error occurred while saving the memory image of the specified virtual machine

data.name: VM_FAILED_SHUTDOWN_ACKNOWLEDGMENT
data.value: VM didn't acknowledge the need to shut down.

data.name: VM_HAS_PCI_ATTACHED
data.value: This operation could not be performed because the VM has one or more PCI devices passed through.

data.name: VM_HOST_INCOMPATIBLE_VIRTUAL_HARDWARE_PLATFORM_VERSION
data.value: The VM's Virtual Hardware Platform version is incompatible with this host.

data.name: VM_HVM_REQUIRED_SHORT
data.value: HVM not supported

data.name: VM_INCOMPATIBLE_WITH_THIS_HOST
data.value: The host does not have some of the CPU features that the VM is currently using

data.name: VM_IS_PART_OF_AN_APPLIANCE
data.value: The VM cannot be recovered on its own as it is part of a VM appliance.

data.name: VM_IS_TEMPLATE
data.value: The operation attempted is not valid for templates

data.name: VM_MIGRATE_FAILED
data.value: VM migration failed: {3}

data.name: VM_REQUIRES_GPU
data.value: You attempted to run a VM on a host which does not have a GPU available in the GPU group needed by the VM.

data.name: VM_REQUIRES_GPU_SHORT
data.value: GPU not available

data.name: VM_REQUIRES_NETWORK
data.value: This VM needs a network that cannot be seen from that server

data.name: VM_REQUIRES_NETWORK_SHORT
data.value: Cannot see required network

data.name: VM_REQUIRES_SR
data.value: This VM needs storage that cannot be seen from that server

data.name: VM_REQUIRES_SR_SHORT
data.value: Cannot see required storage

data.name: VM_REQUIRES_VGPU
data.value: The VM cannot start because the virtual GPU required by it cannot be allocated on any GPU in the GPU group needed by the VM.

data.name: VM_REVERT_FAILED
data.value: An error occurred while reverting the specified virtual machine to the specified snapshot

data.name: VM_SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT
data.value: The shutdown of this VM timed out

data.name: VM_UNSAFE_BOOT
data.value: You attempted an operation on VM {0} that was judged to be unsafe by the server. This can happen if the VM would run on a CPU that has a potentially incompatible set of feature flags to those the VM requires. If you want to override this warning then use the 'force' option.

data.name: WLB_MALFORMED_RESPONSE
data.value: The WLB server said something that the server wasn't expecting or didn't understand.

data.name: XMLRPC_GENERAL_ERROR
data.value: An error occurred while performing the XMLRPC request.
